channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins SSH2 Easy Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins SSH2 Easy Plugin

item.title: CVE-2023-41939|2024-09-26T20:36:58.777Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20ssh2%20easy%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins SSH2 Easy Plugin 1.4 and earlier does not verify that permissions configured to be granted are enabled, potentially allowing users formerly granted (typically optional permissions, like Overall/Manage) to access functionality they're no longer entitled to.
